#summary &oacute character entity
#labels about-html,from-w3c
#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesO

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesO O] > &oacute

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Oacute;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00d3/index.htm U+000D3].
  * `&Oacute` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00d3/index.htm U+000D3].
  * `&oacute;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00f3/index.htm U+000F3].
  * `&oacute` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00f3/index.htm U+000F3].
